Description:
Atkins are looking for Senior Consultant - Asset Management to support our Middle East team.Role:Assist in the delivery of asset management activities on projects

Assist in enhancing the Asset Management service offerings to add value to client’s’ Operations & Maintenance organisation

Support in development of Asset Management Plans

Plan and support asset surveys activates, supervise team of electrical, mechanical and civils technicians in asset condition surveys and data collection.

Undertake PMO responsivities on projects, developing progress reports, risk and issues registers.

Support in the development of pipeline of Asset Management opportunities

Perform qualitative and quantitative analyses and present data findings/outcomesTechnical CompetenciesShall be qualified with a degree (preferably Engineering)

Minimum five (5) years of relevant experience (post qualification) in Asset Management (AM) Advisory/ Consultancy

IAM certification highly preferred

The Candidate must possess excellent working knowledge of project management best practices. Computer literacy and excellent communication skills in English are essential. (Arabic highly preferred)

Asset Lifecycle Delivery assessment

Familiarity with international Asset Management Standards (ISO55000/1)

AM Data Collection & definition of AM Hierarchies & Classifications

AM performance measures development

Familiarisation with various maintenance strategies, condition based, predictive, reactive

Experience in facilitating training session (preferred)Behavioural CompetenciesDemonstrate drive, enthusiasm and commitment to projects

Excellent planning and organisation skills

Able to assess problems and rapidly develop solutions

Transportation allowance
